column4: UPDATE 1-Petrobras CEO says wage hikes of last decade are impossible today
column5: SAO PAULO  Sept 30 Brazil's state-led oil company Petrobras is unable to give its workers raises similar to those that increased pay by about 50 percent in real  inflation-adjusted terms over the past decade  Chief Executive Pedro Parente said on Friday.
